STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_PRIMARY_TITLE: Unleash Your Words, Craft Your Story
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: A Powerful Platform for Text Creation
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what writers and authors have to say about our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my writing process. The AI assistance and content generation tools have helped me overcome writer's block and produce high-quality content more efficiently.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a blogger, I rely on this app to generate fresh and engaging content ideas. The AI-powered tools help me craft compelling stories that resonate with my audience.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has been a game-changer for our content marketing team. The AI writing assistance and optimization tools have helped us create high-converting copy that drives results.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Answers to Your Questions About Building Text
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get insights into our text building application
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app allows you to easily create, edit, and format text content for various purposes like websites, documents, social media posts, and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Some key features include a rich text editor, formatting tools, spell check, word count, and the ability to save and share your work.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, the app supports real-time collaboration so multiple users can work on the same text simultaneously.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Your text is automatically saved as you type, so you don't have to worry about losing your work in case of any interruptions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I access my work from anywhere?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely, your text documents are stored in the cloud, allowing you to access and continue working on them from any device with an internet connection.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Unleash your creativity with our powerful text building platform.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing the future of text creation.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Craft compelling stories, captivating copy, and insightful analysis with our intuitive writing platform.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: Harness the power of AI to elevate your writing.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Create compelling copy with our advanced language models.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Say goodbye to writer's block for good.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Created by writers, for writers. TextCraft empowers you to build compelling narratives and engaging content with ease.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our app provides a robust and versatile text editor, allowing you to create, edit, and format text documents with ease.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Customize your text with a wide range of formatting options, including font styles, sizes, colors, and more.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Seamlessly collaborate with others by sharing documents and enabling real-time editing capabilities.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Sync your documents across multiple devices and access them from anywhere with our cloud integration features.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Save time with our extensive library of pre-designed templates for various document types, from reports to proposals.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Easily export your documents in multiple formats, including PDF, Word, and more, for seamless sharing and printing.
CTA_BODY: Craft compelling narratives, captivating descriptions, and engaging content with our powerful text-building app. Unlock your imagination and let your words come to life.
HERO_SUBTITLE: The ultimate platform for crafting captivating texts.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Craft gripping headlines that captivate readers
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Sculpt powerful subheadings that keep them hooked
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Compose persuasive copy that converts prospects
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Mint memorable slogans that stick in minds
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Forge taglines that encapsulate your brand's essence
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Chisel microcopy that guides users with clarity
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: TextBuilder is a powerful app that allows you to create, edit, and format text content for various purposes like websites, documents, or writing projects.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: TextBuilder provides a rich text editor with formatting tools, spell check, word count, and the ability to import/export files. It also has templates and styling options to make your text look professional.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I collaborate with others on TextBuilder?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, TextBuilder has real-time collaboration features that allow multiple users to work on the same document simultaneously. Changes are synced instantly for seamless teamwork.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: TextBuilder offers a free basic plan with limited features. To access all the advanced tools and collaboration capabilities, you'll need to upgrade to one of our paid subscription plans.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Craft compelling narratives, captivating articles, and engaging stories with our intuitive text-building tools.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Invite team members, share drafts, and seamlessly co-author your written works in real-time.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Polish your masterpieces with advanced editing and proofreading capabilities, ensuring flawless content every time.
